Package com.pushtechnology.diffusion.transform.stream

Package containing utilities for working with streams.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SafeStreamBuilder<S,T>
    An immutable builder for streams.
    StreamBuilder<S,T,V extends Topics.ValueStream<T>>
    An immutable builder for streams.
    StreamHandle
    Handle to a stream to allow it to be closed.
    TransformedStream<S,T>
    A stream of transformed values.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    StreamBuilders
    Factory for creating instances of SafeStreamBuilders and StreamBuilders.
    TransformedStream.Default<S,T>
    Default implementation of a TransformedStream.
